mapper.select: select c.tnum, c.title, c.author, c.publish, c.image, c.url, c.origin_price, c.sale_price, c.amount, b.fnames, b.fsizes, b.uuid from AgeBaby c left outer join bookImage b using(tnum) where substr(tnum,1,1)='category' order by tnum limit ${snum}, 20;
select count(tnum) from AgeBaby where substr(tnum,1,1)='category';
mapper.insert: insert into bookImage (tnum, fnames, fsizes, uuid) values(#{tnum},#{fnames},#{fsizes},#{uuid})
mapper.select: select fnames from bookImage where tnum = #{tnum}
select fsizes from bookImage where tnum = #{tnum}

select c.tnum, c.title, c.author, c.publish, c.image, c.url, c.origin_price, c.sale_price, c.amount, b.fnames,b.fsizes, b.uuid from AgeBaby c left outer join bookImage b using(tnum)
where ${ftype} like concat('%',#{fkey},'%')
where c.title like concat('%',#{fkey},'%') or c.author like concat('%',#{fkey},'%')
limit ${snum}, 10

select count(tnum) cnt from AgeBaby
where ${ftype} like concat('%',#{fkey},'%')
where title like concat('%',#{fkey},'%') or author like concat('%',#{fkey},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into AgeBaby(tnum, title, author, publish, origin_price, sale_price, amount) values (#{tnum}, #{title}, #{author}, #{publish}, #{origin_price}, #{sale_price}, #{amount})
mapper.update: update AgeBaby set author=#{author}, publish=#{publish}, origin_price=#{origin_price}, sale_price=#{sale_price}, amount=#{amount} where tnum = #{tnum}
